education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science

responsibilities: Mentored 80+ students in developing web applications using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

Optimized SQL queries, improving performance by 40%.
Deployed applications on IIS for hosting and production environments.
Developed scalable web application using React.js.
Implemented reusable form components and lazy-loaded routes.
Created REST API microservices and containerized applications using Docker on AWS.
